g.text: Subject: Re: Breaking past $20k/month — support from Sarah Chen

body.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; color: #111827;
body.p: Thanks for sharing such an honest snapshot — it makes total sense you’re feeling overwhelmed juggling delivery, growth, and hiring.

I work with service-based entrepreneurs and Marketing Agencies to build hiring systems and operational processes that let founders stop doing everything and lead a high-performing team — without sacrificing revenue. Based on what you shared, I’d suggest starting with a simple hire + onboarding checklist and a 30-day training plan to protect client delivery while you scale.
If you’re open to it, let’s schedule a 20-minute call to walk through one practical step you can take this week. Would next Tuesday or Thursday work for you?
